message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're on a budget, but I think the product is worth more than $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $125?
I'm still interested in the product, but $125 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $100, but I can only go up to $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see you're making a serious effort to find a price we can both agree on. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $110, so how about $112.50?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $112.50 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $110, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
